DemoMod:SevenLeafClover.NAME: Seven Leaf Clover
DemoMod:SevenLeafClover.FLAVOR: It's extremely rare. It's said to bring incredible luck to the people who carry it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Non-Boss-Chest now drops a rare card(One Choice from Three) and a rare #yRelic.

DemoMod:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you slain an enemy by #yAttack, gain #b2 #yStrength. If receive unblocked #yattack damage, lose ALL #yStrength you gained from this #yRelic.

DemoMod:MemoryAlloy.NAME: Memory Alloy
DemoMod:MemoryAlloy.FLAVOR: The wire will eventually return to its original shape no matter how much it is stretched and twisted.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you take more than #b30 damage in a turn, at the beginning of the next turn, recover the hp lost in the previous turn. Each battle can only take effect once.

DemoMod:VorpalBullet.NAME: Vorpal Bullet
DemoMod:VorpalBullet.FLAVOR: Maybe it doesn't work when you really need it.
DESCRIPTIONS: In a non-boss combat, you have a #b3% chance to do every damage you do to #r9 times the original. Every time the relic is not triggered, the trigger chance is increased by #b1%, and reset the trigger chance after triggered.
(Current trigger probability: #g

DemoMod:HipHolster.NAME: Hip Holster
DemoMod:HipHolster.FLAVOR: "Your gun is not as fast as mine."
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL #yGuns can still deal damage when the #yCapacity is empty.If the #yGun is aimed at one target, after manual #yReload, it will attack a random enemy.
NL #gCombo -Pretty Good: The rewards of potions and relics dropped from defeating enemies become better.

DemoMod:Dog.NAME: Dog
DemoMod:Dog.FLAVOR: A faithful companion. Finds items on room clear.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, #b20% chance to add a random reward to reward screen.

DemoMod:CrisisStone.NAME: Crisis Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yReload a Gun with its Capacity empty, gain #b8 #yBlock.

DemoMod:RingOfEthereal.NAME: Ring Of Ethereal
DemoMod:RingOfEthereal.FLAVOR: This mysterious ring briefly allows one to traverse the ethereal planes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use after you cleaned #b4 rooms. Gain #b1 #yIntangible. NL Use in shop for #rtheft.

DemoMod:Bottle.NAME: Bottle
DemoMod:Bottle.FLAVOR: "If there's something you can't put down, you can put it here for a while."
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b1 potion slot. Right-click to use once in a turn. Deal #b3 damage. If #yFatal, At the start of the next combat, increase the amount of #bRegen by #b3.
(At the start of the next combat, gain #g
#yRegen.)
NL #gCombo -Empty Vessels:Receive unblocked attack damage for the first time in each battle, and deal 30 damage to ALL enemies in the next start of the turn.
NL #gCombo -Cleaner Guon Stone:All #yStatus cards added to the draw pile will be #yExhaust automatically.

DemoMod:SpiceCounter.NAME: Spice Counter
DESCRIPTIONS: Record how much #yStrength you added to the game with #ySpices.
At the start of each combat, gain #g
#yStrength.

DemoMod:DecoyRelic.NAME: Decoy
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use after you cleaned #b4 rooms. NL Use in combat:Summon a decoy, the enemy will only attack the decoy until decoy are destroyed. NL Use in shop for #rtheft.
NL #gCombo -Deadly Distraction: When the decoy is destroyed, apply #b10 Poison to ALL enemies.
NL #gCombo -Kage Bunshin: When there is decoy in the combat, the effect of #yShadow #yBullets certainly be triggered.
NL #gCombo -Decoy Octorok: The maximum HP of the decoy is equal to the maximum HP of the first enemy in the room (no more than #b100).

DemoMod:ChaffGrenade.NAME: Chaff Grenade
DemoMod:ChaffGrenade.FLAVOR: This grenade is full of small, shiny particles.
DESCRIPTIONS: Can use #b3 times. Right-click to use, once a room. Use in combat: Stun ALL enemies this turn. NL Use in shop for #rtheft.

DemoMod:Wolf.NAME: Wolf
DemoMod:Wolf.FLAVOR: Kept the Hunter company, long ago. Reunited with his master through the fractured timestream.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Deal #b12 damage to a random enemy.
NL #gCombo -The Red Hood: Apply #b1 #bWeak.
NL #gCombo -Sniper Woof: At the start of your turn, The next #yAttack you played will deal #g1.5 times of its damage.
NL #gCombo -Tea For Two: You will gain double Omega from #yTea #yPot.

DemoMod:GundromedaStrain.NAME: Gundromeda Strain
DemoMod:GundromedaStrain.FLAVOR: The virus has spread rapidly in the spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Decrease ALL enemies max HP by #b

DemoMod:AgedBell.NAME: Aged Bell
DemoMod:AgedBell.FLAVOR: Some claim that they can hear it before it rings.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use after you cleaned #b4 rooms. Take an extra turn after this one. NL Use in shop for #rtheft.
NL #gCombo -Get Equipped With -F-ï¼šMegahand now can switch to "Time Limiter" mode.

DemoMod:HoleyGrail.NAME: Holey Grail
DemoMod:HoleyGrail.FLAVOR: This artifact of Kaliber was lost to time until the coming of the Mine Flayers and their interdimensional kin.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you receive an unblocked damage, #yReload ALL the #yGuns you have.

DemoMod:WeirdEgg.NAME: Weird Egg
DemoMod:WeirdEgg.FLAVOR: Gestates over time. Use to acquire... something.
DESCRIPTIONS: One-time relic, right-click to use. Gain a random relic. NL The more floors you climb with it, the rarer relic you will gain.

DemoMod:Ammonomicon.NAME: Ammonomicon
DemoMod:Ammonomicon.FLAVOR: It records all kinds of guns, many of which you don't even know.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a random #yBullet series #yPower into your hand. It costs #b0 this turn.

DemoMod:PoisonVial.NAME: Poison Vial
DemoMod:PoisonVial.FLAVOR: For external use only, not for internal use.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the counter for each room cleaned or entered. Right-click to use. Apply the counter of levels of #yPoison to an enemy.

DemoMod:BigBoy.NAME: Big Boy
DemoMod:BigBoy.FLAVOR: Nuclear arms were forbidden by the Third Interstellar Armistice, but as large sections of the Gungeon existed before that accord was signed, it is a bit of a grey area legally.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use whenever you cleaned #b3 rooms. Deal #b40 damage to ALL enemies and Apply #b10 #yPoison to them.

DemoMod:GlassGuonStoneRelic.NAME: Glass Guon Stone
DemoMod:GlassGuonStoneRelic.FLAVOR: A gift from the Lady of Pane.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every Glass Guon Stone you have, at the end of your turn, gain #b
Block each. When you receive an unblocked #yattack damage, lose ALL Glass Guon Stone.

DemoMod:Antibody.NAME: Antibody
DemoMod:Antibody.FLAVOR: an experimental treatment administered by the Gungeon's medical unit.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you heal, #b
% chance to double the heal amount.

DemoMod:WhiteGuonStone.NAME: White Guon Stone
DemoMod:WhiteGuonStone.FLAVOR: The White Guon Stone grants its bearer an additional Blank on every floor.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain a #yBlank. When enter a new act, gain #b1 more #yBlank. NL At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yBlock.

DemoMod:OrangeGuonStone.NAME: Orange Guon Stone
DemoMod:OrangeGuonStone.FLAVOR: Belligerite at the core of the stone has grown so enraged that the stone itself now lashes out at foes.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yBlock and deal #b5 damage to a random enemy.
NL #gCombo -Enter The Fruitgeon: The damage Orange Guon Stone dealt increased to #b7.
NL #gCombo -Oranger Guon Stone: When Orange Guon Stone attack, it now attack with VFX.

DemoMod:ClearGuonStone.NAME: Clear Guon Stone
DemoMod:ClearGuonStone.FLAVOR: The Clear Guon Stone continuously cleanses the blood of its bearer of all impurities.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yBlock. #yExhaust ALL the #yBurn and #ySlime that added to the draw pile.

DemoMod:GreenGuonStone.NAME: Green Guon Stone
DemoMod:GreenGuonStone.FLAVOR: The Green Guon Stone abhors pain.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yBlock. NL Whenever you receive an unblocked #yattack damage, #b20% chance to heal #b6 HP. NL When receive a deadly #yattack damage, #b50% chance to revive and heal #b10 HP.

DemoMod:PinkGuonStone.NAME: Pink Guon Stone
DemoMod:PinkGuonStone.FLAVOR: The Pink Guon Stone is actually a White Guon Stone that has been used as a component in blood rituals, infusing it with the hearts of fallen Gungeoneers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, increase your max HP by #b7. At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yBlock.

DemoMod:RedGuonStone.NAME: Red Guon Stone
DemoMod:RedGuonStone.FLAVOR: The Red Guon Stone is 40% Dodgicite, greatly improving dodge roll speed and distance.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yBlock. The #yBlock you gain from card #yRoll is increased by #b6.

DemoMod:BlueGuonStone.NAME: Blue Guon Stone
DemoMod:BlueGuonStone.FLAVOR: The Blue Guon Stone, or the Stone of the Critical Perception, increases its bearers reaction times in dangerous situations.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 #yBlock. Whenever you receive an unblocked #yattack damage, In the next #b3 turns, gain #b20 #yBlock at the start of each turn. Can only trigger once in a combat.

DemoMod:MeltedRock.NAME: Melted Rock
DemoMod:MeltedRock.FLAVOR: This rock is a testament to one poor soul, whose agony was so great that it still echoes in the bodies of the freshly deceased.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, deal #b6 damage to ALL enemies.
NL #gCombo -Human Shield: At the same time, gain #b8 times #yBlock of the number of enemies killed in the room.

DemoMod:Orange.NAME: Orange
DemoMod:Orange.FLAVOR: With this orange, your style... it's impetuous.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your max HP by #b12.

DemoMod:MonsterBlood.NAME: Monster Blood
DemoMod:MonsterBlood.FLAVOR: This canister contains a sample of dangerous monster blood, collected by Mdecins Sans Diplme for study.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, increase your max HP by #b7. Whenever you receive an unblocked #yattack damage, apply #b2 #yPoison to ALL enemies.

DemoMod:SuperHotWatch.NAME: Super Hot Watch
DemoMod:SuperHotWatch.FLAVOR: This watch is extremely hot to the touch.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you didn't play any cards during your turn, Take an extra turn after this one. It can only be triggered twice in a row.

DemoMod:RiddleOfLead.NAME: Riddle Of Lead
DemoMod:RiddleOfLead.FLAVOR: A relic for the first hero to master the Gungeon. Bestows unreasonable courage in the face of danger, and the luck to survive it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, increase your max HP by #b10 and heal all HP. At the start of the combat, gain #b2 #yStrength #yDexterity and #yFocus. NL When your HP is less than or equal to %b25% of the maximum HP, #b50% chance of immune damage.

DemoMod:Relodestone.NAME: Relodestone
DemoMod:Relodestone.FLAVOR: The molecules in this rare piece of stone naturally aligned such that all of their face the same direction.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use after you cleaned #b6 rooms. Before the start of the next turn, absorb #yattack damage from ALL enemies, And return to all enemies at the start of the next turn.

DemoMod:LichsEyeBullet.NAME: Lichs Eye Bullet
DemoMod:LichsEyeBullet.FLAVOR: This pair of rounds radiates unfathomable magical power.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL #yGuns gain their #yCombo effects automatically.

DemoMod:PortableTableDevice.NAME: Portable Table Device
DemoMod:PortableTableDevice.FLAVOR: "Advanced polymers reinforce this state-of-the-art handheld dining surface."
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, Choose one of the 3 random #yTableTech cards to put in your hand.

DemoMod:JetPack.NAME: Jet Pack
DemoMod:JetPack.FLAVOR: Only a Gungeoneer with a deathwish would give up their dodge roll. Luckily, this jetpack can easily be toggled on or off.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use after you cleaned #b1 room. Gain #b1 #yFlight. You cannot gain #yBlock from cards for #b2 turns.

DemoMod:WaxWing.NAME: Wax Wings
DemoMod:WaxWing.FLAVOR: A pair of finely-crafted wax wings.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yFlight.

DemoMod:StrengthOfFortune.NAME: Strength Of Fortune
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attack deals #b3 times damage.

DemoMod:Limited.NAME: Limited
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, clear ALL the #yGun's ammo which from your master deck.

DemoMod:Armor.NAME: Armor
DemoMod:Armor.FLAVOR: With these little armors, your heart is steadfast.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive an unblocked damage, lose #b1 armor to offset this damage.

DemoMod:Unsteady.NAME: Unsteady
DemoMod:Unsteady.FLAVOR: You suddenly feel uncertain about doing anything.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b10 cards, #yExhaust #b1 random card from your hand.

DemoMod:GnawedKey.NAME: Gnawed Key
DemoMod:GnawedKey.FLAVOR: The handle is shaped like the skill of a rodent. What could it unlock?
DESCRIPTIONS: The key to open the entrance to the nest of Resourceful Rat.

DemoMod:Test1.NAME: Test1
DemoMod:Test1.FLAVOR: I haven't thought about the description yet.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yReload a #yGun each turn, gain [E].

DemoMod:RatBoots.NAME: Rat Boots
DemoMod:RatBoots.FLAVOR: Stolen off a hapless pointy-eared adventurer.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 Dexterity. NL Whenever you have a #yReload, gain #b3 #yBlock.

DemoMod:ResourcefulSack.NAME: Resourceful Sack
DemoMod:ResourcefulSack.FLAVOR: An otherwise normal sack, used by the Right people for acts of thievery.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive an attack from an enemy, raise the counter by #b1(The max value of the counter is #b30). Right-click to use, deal #b3 damage to an enemy #yCounter times.
(Deal #b3 damage #b
times.)

DemoMod:PartiallyEatenCheese.NAME: Partially Eaten Cheese
DemoMod:PartiallyEatenCheese.FLAVOR: Temporarily changes what game you're playing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use after you dealt #b600 damage. You are invincible in the next #b2 turns and add an #yEat #yIt! to your hand for each start of your turn.

DemoMod:MeatBun.NAME: Meat Bun
DemoMod:MeatBun.FLAVOR: "A delicious, freshly baked roll! Sometimes, things just work out!"
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, heal #b14 HP. NL Before you take damage, Double your unblocked damage to the enemy.

DemoMod:NanoMachines.NAME: Nano Machines
DemoMod:NanoMachines.FLAVOR: These self-replicating Nanomachines transform lead that enters the body into armor.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #b2 #yArmor. Whenever take damage for #b4 times, after the enemy's current action, gain #b1 #yArmor.
NL #gCombo -Steel Skin: Now you no longer lose #yBlock when you play AC-15.
NL #gCombo -Pretty Good: The rewards of potions and relics dropped from defeating enemies become better.

DemoMod:ElasticCartridgeClip.NAME: Elastic Cartridge Clip
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL You can no longer see the clip's #yCapacity.
